summary:
Add a bridge to the river on the east side of Whiterun.
Add a bridge to the position connecting Chillfurrow Farm and White River Watch.
Navmesh is also equipped and NPC can move.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#d9ead3][color=#d9d2e9][size=5]Latest information[/size][/color]
[size=4]
[color=#ffffff]Ver1.00[/color][/size]
Initial release

[color=#c9daf8][size=5]About PDWhiterunEastBridge.[/size][/color]

Add a bridge to the river on the east side of Whiterun.
Add a bridge to the position connecting Chillfurrow Farm and White River Watch.
Navmesh is also equipped and NPC can move.
[img width=1145,height=644]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88701/88701-1514865093-126040047.jpeg[/img]

[color=#f4cccc][size=5]Installation[/size][/color]
It recommended the introduction of the MO or NMM.
Clean Save and New Game is not particularly necessary.

[color=#fff2cc][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color]
HearthFires[/color]
author: puratina
